titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The wind fell, and the rain came down. The river was 'in spate', & the water–falls on the bank became quite respectable cascades. I worked on at the Lecture, & attended Evensong in the Cathedral. M
Travers Lewis took her departure after lunch.
